name: Truck Heavy Simulator Offroad
description:
Be an extreme off-road hill driver to deliver cargo to army camps. Playing as the off road army truck driving is a hard tasks especially transporting cargo, army relief and other military vehicles on off road steep paths.

Use the gas and brake at the right time to ensure your army truck running smooth. These army base environments have very dangerous roads, mountains and check points. So drive carefully. You're driving skills around these difficult areas by driving off road army trucks.

Truck Heavy Simulator Offroad Features:
-Real army off road simulator
-Smooth steering & brakes
-Beautiful 3D graphics and hill environments
-Excited background
-Complete missions
-More different type army truck to choose
-Slow down if there is a turn ahead
-Be patient racing
